messages.title: Let's get Brexit done – so we can get on with our priorities
messages.content: By voting for a Conservative majority Government, we can end the paralysis in Parliament, get Brexit done and move on to other priorities - our NHS, schools, police and economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledge of £33.9 billion funding for the NHS.
Promise of 20,000 extra police officers to make our streets safer.
More funding for every pupil in every school.

mentions.candidate: Mims Davies will bring local and Westminster experience to deliver for Mid Sussex.

issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.

leaflet.personalStatement: Mims Davies is a local resident who understands the community's needs well and will be a strong local voice for you in Parliament.

politicalExperience.role: Government Minister and former Mid Sussex District Councillor
politicalExperience.achievements: Combines local knowledge with the experience of getting things done in Westminster.

images.caption: Mims Davies speaking at an event.
